incidents.title: Canada Host 4 network issues
incidents.content:
2021-03-12T12:11:25.268Z
Resolved

All services are online again. OVH confirmed that the server was inaccessible from the network due to a network issue.

Task was: http://travaux.ovh.net/?do=details&id=49523

2021-03-11T21:11:25.268Z
Identified

Host 4 started to show significant packet loss. After a reboot, it does not come online again. Hard reboot times out. IPMI times out. An OVH technician is already working on the rack.

incidents.title: Fire in Strasbourg, France Data Center
incidents.content: OVH Announcement: We are currently facing a major incident in our DataCenter of Strasbourg. If your production is in Strasbourg, we recommend to activate your Disaster Recovery Plan. Detailed information http://travaux.ovh.net/?do=details&id=49484

incidents.title: Reboot Host 5
incidents.content: Reboot Host 5 to fix bugged cgroups.
